title: [W]Acas early conciliation certificate
p1: [W]You should check the Acas certificate number and date, or whether the claimant was correct to say they were exempt from early conciliation.
label: [W]Do you disagree with any details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?
whyLabel: [W]Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given?

disagreeEarlyConciliationWhy.tooLong: [W]The details of why you disagree must be less than 2500 characters
